doc.title: The Final Events
doc.plot: The Final EVENTS: the top action packed docudrama that story-lines the coming Final Days. The Final Events DVD will challenge viewers as they witness catastrophic Armageddon events that are prophesied to begin in our life time - soon. Non Christians, and Non-practicing Christians will take this DVD very seriously because it includes CNN-like news reports, radio news bulletins and a powerful multi-media blend of today's events, like the introduction of REAL ID, computer chip technology, Bird-Flu and more that are linked directly to the Bible's prophecy of the end times. Watch 'on-the-spot' reporters as they describe demon armies battling the army of Jesus: by the end of the program even the most die-hard skeptic will be frightened and turn to the Bible.
